      • getSuperWhiteListForHwSystemManger

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> getSuperWhiteListForHwSystemManger(android.content.ComponentName who)
        get superWhiteList of device.
        参数:
        who - The name of the admin component.(can be null)

      • setSuperWhiteListForHwSystemManger

        public boolean setSuperWhiteListForHwSystemManger(android.content.ComponentName who,
                                                  java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> list)
        restore superWhiteList of device.
        参数:
        who - The name of the admin component.(can not be null)
        list - means package name list
        抛出:
        java.lang.SecurityException - if the calling device admin does not have {com.huawei.systemmanager.permission.ACCESS_INTERFACE}
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the input parameters are not suitable, an IllegalArgumentException will be throwed.

      • removeSuperWhiteListForHwSystemManger

        public boolean removeSuperWhiteListForHwSystemManger(android.content.ComponentName who,
                                                     java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> list)
        remove superWhiteList of device.
        参数:
        who - The name of the admin component.(can not be null)
        list - means package name list
        抛出:
        java.lang.SecurityException - if the calling device admin does not have {com.huawei.systemmanager.permission.ACCESS_INTERFACE}
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the input parameters are not suitable, an IllegalArgumentException will be throwed.

      • setDataSaverMode

        public boolean setDataSaverMode(android.content.ComponentName who,
                                boolean disable)
        set DataSaverMode of device.
        参数:
        who - The name of the who component.(can not be null)
        抛出:
        java.lang.SecurityException - if the calling device admin does not have {com.huawei.systemmanager.permission.ACCESS_INTERFACE}
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the input parameters are not suitable, an IllegalArgumentException will be throwed. set DataSaverMode value.

      • getDataSaverMode

        public boolean getDataSaverMode(android.content.ComponentName who,
                                boolean disable)
        get DataSaverMode of device.
        参数:
        who - The name of the who component.(can be null)
        disable - means boolean value return DataSaverMode value.
